intro: In a magical forest where every creature and plant is connected by an ancient power called the Heart of the Forest, life begins to fall apart.
description:
Eryk, a young man who possesses the rare ability to hear the whispers of the forest, discovers that this imbalance has a deeper cause.

Together with his loyal companions Lyra, a brave warrior, and Nimbus, an agile and clever bird, he embarks on a journey to restore the Heart and save his home.

Facing dangerous tests, mysterious guardians and their own fears, the group must prove that unity and trust are the keys to overcome the most difficult challenges.

An adventure where courage, wisdom and the bond between friends will be put to the test at every step.
